amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section requiring that the salary for individual Members of Congress shall be paid out of funds in the bill for the District of Columbia and shall be limited to $92,500.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A033). Mr. Lewis (CA) stated that the provisions of the Obey amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
